<title level="1" right="Hazard 2" pfs="">[Exploding Statue](/Hazards.aspx?ID=369)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 26</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A hollow statue filled with explosives is connected to a trip wire running along the adjacent door.

---

**Stealth**
DC 18 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 21 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (trained) to safely cut the wire

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 21, **Fort** +6, **Ref** +12

**Hardness**
5

**HP**
30 (BT 15)

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Explosion** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature opens the northern door without first disabling the trip wire; **Effect** The statue explodes, spraying shrapnel to the west in a 5-foot cone and dealing 1d10+7 piercing and 1d10 fire damage to all creatures in the affected area (DC 18 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).
